metadata.title: RHSA-2020:0688: OpenShift Container Platform 4.2.22 runc security update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform is Red Hat's cloud computing
Kubernetes application platform solution designed for on-premise or private
cloud deployments.

Security Fix(es):

* runc: volume mount race condition with shared mounts led to information leak/integrity manipulation (CVE-2019-19921)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS
score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE
page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: volume mount race condition with shared mounts leads to information leak/integrity manipulation

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
runc is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
